message.body: ###### had one of the girls ride ##### today, and they are goin to try working with ###### tomorrow. Do you think you'll try to brig him to dc pretty soo
n after you move? I'm sure ### could coordinate a ride via welsh shows in may but you might want him sooner right?
I'll have to see about finding a barn first i think. and seeing where we'll live, how much I'm working, etc. probably not til spring.
